root.name: Rugby League Live
root.description: Rugby League Live Features Include: · 40 licensed teams from competitions such as the NRL, Super League, State of Origin, City v Country, and World Cup. · 30 realistic stadia from around the world. · 4 player multiplayer. · Bone crunching tackles and impact camera replays. · Field and uniform degradation. · Create your own players, teams and competitions. · Multiple replay angles and commentary by Andrew Voss. · Join friends for head to head co-operative online play via PlayStation®Network, and Xbox LIVE®.
